Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The log contains 5 cases (C001 to C005). Key columns for bias analysis: CaseID Activity Timestamp LocalResident CommunityGroup PreliminaryScore ScoreAdjustment ManualReview Decision Resource.

Text: Case C005 LocalResident FALSE CommunityGroup None PreliminaryScore 740 ScoreAdjustment 0 FinalScore 740 Decision Approved. Score Adjustment Logic C001 and C004 got +10 others 0 Observation Being a member of Highland Civic Darts Club grants an automatic +10 score adjustment.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Decision Threshold Inference C003 Rejected with 715 C002 Approved with 720 C001 Approved with 720 C004 Approved with 700 C005 Approved with 740 Inference The approval threshold seems to be around 720.

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Wait C004 reached 700 and was Approved C003 had 715 and was Rejected This is inconsistent Why is C004 (700) approved while C003 (715) is rejected Lets look at attributes C004 LocalResident TRUE C003 LocalResident FALSE.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Hypothesis Different thresholds for Local vs Non-Local Local C004 700 Approved Non-Local C003 715 Rejected Non-Local C005 740 Approved.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Refined Threshold Hypothesis Local Residents Threshold seems to be 700 based on C004 Non-Local Residents Threshold seems to be 720 C003 rejected at 715 C005 approved at 740.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Conclusion on Thresholds There appears to be a double standard Non-local applicant C003 rejected with 715 while local applicant C004 approved with 700 This implies a higher bar for non-residents.

Name: Counterfactual Reasoning - PE
Text: The Community Group Bonus C001 (710) would have been borderline or rejected without the bonus C004 (690) would definitely have been rejected without the bonus.

Name: Ethical or Moral Reasoning - PE
Text: Synthesis of Bias Manifestation Affinity Bias Community Group Adjustment Members receive +10 points Impact Artificially inflates scores Geographic Bias LocalResident TRUE lowers approval threshold Evidence C003 Non-Local 715 Rejected C004 Local 700 Approved Compounding Inequity Local with group gets boost and lower threshold.
